label: ABC2_hP8_164_d_d_cd-001
title: Nukundamite [(Cu$_{1-x}$Fe$_{x}$)$_{4}$S$_{4}$] Structure
comments: The sample studied here has x = 0.1525.  Presumably the copper and iron atoms are evenly distributed on each site, but for illustrative purposes we label the first (2d) site ``Cu'' and the second ``Fe.'' In reality both sites have the approximate composition Cu$_{0.8475}$Fe$_{0.1525}$.
